Toggle Menu

salt.modules.rh_ip

The networking module for RHEL/Fedora based distros

apply_network_settings

Syntax

salt.modules.rh_ip.apply_network_settings(
								**settings
								)

Details

Apply global network configuration.

CLI Example:

salt '*' ip.apply_network_settings

build_bond

Syntax

salt.modules.rh_ip.build_bond(
								iface,
								**settings
								)

Details

Create a bond script in /etc/modprobe.d with the passed settings and load the bonding kernel module.

CLI Example:

salt '*' ip.build_bond bond0 mode=balance-alb

build_interface

Syntax

salt.modules.rh_ip.build_interface(
								iface,
								iface_type,
								enabled,
								**settings
								)

Details

Build an interface script for a network interface.

CLI Example:

salt '*' ip.build_interface eth0 eth <settings>

build_network_settings

Syntax

salt.modules.rh_ip.build_network_settings(
								**settings
								)

Details

Build the global network script.

CLI Example:

salt '*' ip.build_network_settings <settings>

build_routes

Syntax

salt.modules.rh_ip.build_routes(
								iface,
								**settings
								)

Details

Build a route script for a network interface.

CLI Example:

salt '*' ip.build_routes eth0 <settings>

down

Syntax

salt.modules.rh_ip.down(
								iface,
								iface_type
								)

Details

Shutdown a network interface

CLI Example:

salt '*' ip.down eth0

get_bond

Syntax

salt.modules.rh_ip.get_bond(
								iface
								)

Details

Return the content of a bond script

CLI Example:

salt '*' ip.get_bond bond0

get_interface

Syntax

salt.modules.rh_ip.get_interface(
								iface
								)

Details

Return the contents of an interface script

CLI Example:

salt '*' ip.get_interface eth0

get_network_settings

Syntax

salt.modules.rh_ip.get_network_settings( )

Details

Return the contents of the global network script.

CLI Example:

salt '*' ip.get_network_settings

get_routes

Syntax

salt.modules.rh_ip.get_routes(
								iface
								)

Details

Return the contents of the interface routes script.

CLI Example:

salt '*' ip.get_routes eth0

up

Syntax

salt.modules.rh_ip.up(
								iface,
								iface_type
								)

Details

Start up a network interface

CLI Example:

salt '*' ip.up eth0
